## Overview of First Project:
* **Population Genomics of Multidrug resistance in *Streptococcus pneumoniae* **
* Antibiotic resistance is an increasing problem in the important human pathogen _Streptococcus pneumoniae_ 
* I analsysed WGS of isolates in two large international collections of Multidrug resistant _S. pneumoniae_ as well as mining large public sequence databases to assess the spread of two common antibiotic resistance elements.
